comments.raw_text: The arrow part of the doorhanger is an ugly grey blob that doesn't match the colour scheme of the rest of the panel.
comments.text:
Created attachment 529370
Ugly triangular arrows.

The arrow part of the doorhanger is an ugly grey blob that doesn't match the colour scheme of the rest of the panel.
Actually it's the border colour, so anything else would let you see the join. (Unless you start messing around with trying to get the arrow to overlap the border, perhaps...)
